line.name: ACE
line.text:
Sandy Reroute  Posted: 04/30/2013  3:35PM

Until further notice:

[A] No trains between Howard Beach-JFK/Broad Channel and the Rockaways due to damage sustained during hurricane Sandy.

Free shuttle buses operate nonstop between Howard Beach [A] and Mott Av [H] Stations.

[H] Free shuttle trains operate between Mott Av and Beach 90 St, days and evenings.

Q22  buses provide local service in the Rockaways.

Find out more at:  http://www.mta.info/nyct/service/RebuildingRockawaysAfterHurricanSandy.htm

line.name: B1 - B83
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/30/2013  3:36PM

B65 bus detoured due to construction on Dean St between Classon Av and Franklin Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Via Dean St, left on Classon Av, right on Atlantic Av, right on Franklin Av and regular route.

Buses will make all corresponding stops along route.

Allow additional travel time. 



Planned Detour
B44 buses detoured due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Nostrand Av
at Avenue H.

Northbound: Buses will make stops along
Flatbush Av at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
B25 bus stop closure due to Brooklyn Bridge construction

Until further notice

Buses will not stop on Old Fulton St at Prospect St.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board on
Henry St at Cranberry St or Old Fulton St at Hicks St.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Planned Detour
Bx41 buses running with delays due to paving

Weeknights, 7 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 8 - May 3

Northbound/Southbound: Buses will run with delays due
to paving from Webster Av between E 203 St to E 165 St.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx9, Bx12/Bx12SBS, Bx17 and Bx22 buses running with delays due to paving

Weeknights, 7 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 8 - May 3

Northbound/Southbound Bx9, Bx17 and Bx22: Buses
will run will delays from E Fordham Rd between Southern
Blvd and 3 Av.

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will run will delays from
E Fordham Rd between Southern Blvd and 3 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx12/Bx12SBS buses running with delays due to paving

Weeknights, 7 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 8 - May 3

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will run with delays
from E Fordham Rd between the Grand Concourse
and University Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/30/2013  6:37PM

M2 bus detoured due to a pedestrian accident at 116 St and 7 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Northbound: Via 7 Av, left on 116 St, right on 8 Av, right on 125 St, left on 7 Av and then regular route.

Allow additional travel time.



Service Change  Posted: 04/30/2013  3:36PM

M7, M20 and M104 buses are detoured, due to construction on Central Park S at 7 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Southbound: Via Columbus Circle, right on Broadway, left on W 57 St, right on 7 Av and regular route.

There will be no service between Columbus Circle and 7 Av/58 St. 

Buses will make corresponding stops along detour.

Allow additional travel time.  



Planned Detour
M31 bus stop change

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the York Av at 61 St stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board
on 62 St at York Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 bus stop change due to construction

Until further notice

Temporary bus stop change due to construction.

M22 Westbound: Buses will bypass stops on
Chambers St at Church St and West Broadway.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project Phase II

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Chambers St between
North End Av and Broadway.

Eastbound: Buses will make stops along Warren St
between North End Av and West St.

On Warren St between Broadway and Church St at
corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 bus stop closure

Until further notice

Buses will not make the stop on 7 Av South at
Waverly Pl between Charles and Perry Sts.

M20 Southbound: Buses will make stops on
7 Av South at 10 and 12 Sts.




Planned Detour
M5 and M20 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops on State St on the far side of Whitehall and Water Sts
and on the near side of Broad St are temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the State St at Whitehall St bus stop, customers
are advised to board southbound on State St near the South Ferry
Terminal entrance.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M20 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from West Broadway at
Chambers St.

Southbound: Buses will make stops on Reade St
and West Broadway.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M15 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops along South St at Broad and Whitehall Sts are
temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the Broad St and Whitehall St stops,
customers are advised to board at the South Ferry Terminal.

For the Water St at Broad St bus stop, customers are advised
to board at Old Slip.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/30/2013  5:57PM

Q83 bus detoured, due to blockage on Murdock Av and Colfax Street.

Detour as follows:

Southbound only:  Via Murdock Av, right on 212 St, left on Colfax St, then regular route.

All corresponding stops will be made along detour.



Service Change  Posted: 04/30/2013  4:15PM

Q16 bus detoured due to road work on Francis Lewis Blvd and 29 Av.

Detour is as follows:

Eastbound: Via 29 Av, right on Francis Lewis Blvd, right on Utopia Pkwy, left on 32 Av, left on Francis Lewis Blvd and then regular route.

No bus stops missed.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
Q19 buses detoured due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from 126 St at Northern Blvd.

No stops will be missed.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Q10 Lefferts Blvd Branch to be limited stop only

Beginning, Sunday, Apr 28

All Q10 Lefferts Blvd Branch local buses will change to
limited stop to provide faster, more consistent service.
The Q10 limited will give exclusive service to the Lefferts
Blvd Branch south of Rockaway Blvd in South Ozone Pk.

The hours of service for the Q10 Limited will be expanded
5:30 am to 11:30 pm on weekdays
6:15 am to 11:30 pm on Saturdays and Sundays

Q10 limited bus stop added in both directions
• Lefferts Blvd and 150 Av

Q10 local only bus stops on the Lefferts Blvd
Branch to be discontinued:
• Lefferts Blvd at Sutter Av, 133 Av and 149 Av

Q10 local service will continue to operate via the
130 St branch. Service on the 130 St branch will
remain unchanged.

line.name: Babylon
line.text:
Babylon Branch Customers:

LIRR service is now running on or close to schedule. There are some trains with residual delays of up to 30 minutes due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment problems.

line.name: Far Rockaway
line.text:
Far Rockaway Branch Customers:

LIRR service is now running on or close to schedule. There are some trains with residual delays of up to 30 minutes due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment problems.

line.name: Hempstead
line.text:
Hempstead Branch Customers:

LIRR service is now running on or close to schedule. There are some trains with residual delays of up to 30 minutes due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment problems.

  • The 5:41PM train from Hempstead due Penn at 6:33PM, is canceled due to earlier switch trouble near Garden City. Customers will be accommodated by the 6:20PM from Hempstead. Customers traveling to Penn should transfer in Jamaica.

line.name: Long Beach
line.text:
Long Beach Branch Customers:

LIRR service is now running on or close to schedule. There are some trains with residual delays of up to 30 minutes due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment problems.

line.name: Montauk
line.text:
Montauk Branch Customers:

LIRR service is now running on or close to schedule. There are some trains with residual delays of up to 30 minutes due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment problems.

The 6:30PM train from Patchogue due Babylon at 7:03PM, is operating 40 minutes late due to a late arriving eastbound train.

line.name: Oyster Bay
line.text:
Oyster Bay Branch Customers:

LIRR service is now running on or close to schedule. There are some trains with residual delays of up to 30 minutes due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment problems.

line.name: Port Jefferson
line.text:
Port Jefferson Branch Customers:

LIRR service is now running on or close to schedule. There are some trains with residual delays of up to 30 minutes due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment problems.

The 6:49PM train from Stony Brook due Huntington at 7:56PM, is operating 18 minutes late due to a late arriving eastbound train.

The 6:29PM train from Huntington due Penn at 7:34PM, is operating 11 minutes late due to a late arriving eastbound train.

The 5:12PM train from Hunterspoint Ave. due Port Jefferson at 7:00PM, is operating 17 minutes late due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment trouble near Queens Village.

line.name: Port Washington
line.text:
Port Washington Branch Customers:

The 7:01PM train from Penn due Port Washington at 7:36PM, is canceled due to equipment trouble. Customers will be accommodated by the 7:14PM from Penn, which will be extended to Port Washington.

line.name: Ronkonkoma
line.text:
Ronkonkoma Branch Customers:

LIRR service is now running on or close to schedule. There are some trains with residual delays of up to 30 minutes due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment problems.

The 5:01PM train from Penn due Ronkonkoma at 6:20PM, is operating 21 minutes late due to congestion caused by an earlier train with equipment trouble near Queens Village.

line.name: Wassaic
line.text: Buses replace Wassaic Branch train service April 7 through June 2 between 9 AM and 5 PM on weekdays, and between 8 AM and 3 PM on Sundays to accommodate a rock slope remediation project. The bus schedule is included in the April 7 Harlem Line timetables. See http://bit.ly/9rsE8k for schedule. Customers seeking intermediate travel between Wassaic and Southeast must request the stop to the bus driver.  *Note:  Buses will only stop at intermediate stations when requested*
